section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter, including the establishment of:

para.text: Procedures for license application, issuance, and renewal;
Procedures for regulation of nurse staffing agencies located outside the District of Columbia;
Requirements for maintenance of documentation and for submission of documentation to the Department;
Minimum standards for operation and continued licensure of nurse staffing agencies; and

annotations.annotation: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to D.C. Law 15-74, the “Nursing Staffing Agency Act of 2003”, see Mayor’s Order 2004-83, May 21, 2004 ( 51 DCR 5837).
